title: How do I view a web page in full screen or save a web page to bookmarks?
answer:
To view a web page in full screen, touch the menu key. From the displayed option menu, choose Settings. Touch Labs > Full screen. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112854)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112855) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112856)

 To save a web page to bookmarks, touch the menu key. From the displayed option menu, choose Save to bookmarks. On the displayed screen, set parameters and touch OK. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112857)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112858)
